name: Security
description: Contain the worst of the worst. Sites that are known to distribute malware, launch phishing attacks or botnet command-and-control servers used to communicate with already infected machines.

name: Ads & Trackers
description: Includes the most comprehensive ads and trackers blocking lists out there.

name: Porn
description: Blocks all sexually explicit content and force Safe Search on search engines (and Youtube). Handy on kid-friendly networks and those morally opposed to pornography.
